PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-09442018-06-25ECCC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectAkasaba West Copper-Gold Mine Project
PrecisOrder Deciding that the significant adverse environmental effects that the AKASABA WEST COPPER-GOLD MINE project proposed by Agnico Eagle Ltd., 15 km east of Val-d'Or, Quebec, is likely to cause are justified in the circumstances, pursuant to section 52(4) of the CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL ASSESSMENT ACT, 2012.
